import React from "react"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import tradie_membership_1 from "../../assets/icons/tradieTV-title-after.svg"; import tradie_membership_2 from "../../assets/icons/icon-credit-card.png"; import tradie_membership_3 from "../../assets/icons/icon-edit.png"; import tradie_membership_4 from "../../assets/images/professional-tradie.jpg"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import tradie_directory_1 from "../../assets/icons/section-top-directory-before.svg"; const Index = () => { let userInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("tepatredieUserInfo")); const { userData } = useSelector((state) => state.auth); return (
{/* */}

My Membership

{/* */}

My Subscription

    Standard Adverts
  • 7 days (auto renew)
  • Included for all tradies user
  • Unlimited leads
  • Directory listing
  • Photo Gallery

$3.99 / week

upgrade cancel subscription

Manage card

Visa Card

Free Advert

$0

  • Get a webpage on our website
  • Receive leads direct from clients 24-7 up to a 25km radius
  • Show your phone, email and full profile with contact details
Choose Plan

Standard Advert

$3.99 / week

  • Appear above free members
  • Get a webpage on our website with your logo and up to 5 pictures of your work.
  • Receive leads direct from clients 24-7 up to a 50km radius
  • Show your phone, email and full profile with contact details
  • Customers can contact you direct and through our app via leads
  • Get a Tap A Tradie standard verification if requirements are met.
Choose Plan

Premium Advert

$7.99 / week

  • Appear above standard and free members
  • Get a webpage on our website with up to 10 pictures to showcase your work.
  • Receive leads direct from clients 24-7 up to a 100km radius
  • Show your phone, email and full profile with contact details
  • Customers can contact you direct and through our app via leads
  • Get a Tap A Tradie gold verification if requirements are met.
Choose Plan
{/* */} {userInfo?.access == "provider" ? ( "" ) : (

Are you a Professional Tradie?

If you would like to be part of our Tradie community and are ready to meet new clients today please continue so we can welcome you onboard.

); }; export default Index;
